name: OJA Red Wine Glasses Set of 4- Hand Blown Premium Crystal Wine Glasses-17 oz, Long Stem,Thin Rim, Perfect for Red or White, Daily Use, Unique Wedding Anniversary or Birthday Gift
about_this_item: PURE CRYSTAL: LUNA&MANTHA comes from the OJA brand,it's red wine glasses have passed the European certification, using premium titanium crystal, making the wine glasses ultra-thin (as thin as 0.8mm), brilliant and light enough. Its sparkling appearance, resonant sound and pleasant hold are indeed a gift you can cherish for years

100% HAND BLOWN: Inheriting traditional hand-blown craftsmanship, LUNA&MANTHA red wine glasses are carefully blown through 27 processes by sophisticated craftsmen with over 12 years experience. Unique glasses with its unique pulled stem, there is no seam between stem and bowl

ENHANCE WINE TASTING: Tulip glassware is the best shape for wine glasses. The bowl is not only aesthetically pleasing, but it allows wine to breathe without over-oxygenating. The rim of the glass feels ultra-thin and inconspicuous in your mouth, like floating in the air and drinking. These make to better experience the wine itself while tasting it

LONG STEM: The slender 4 3/4in stem allows to easily hold, and the decanent feeling in your hand makes it easier to swirl wine. Long crystal stem adds an elegant and refined visual feel to the wine glass. Not only exquisite artwork placed at home, but also a must-have for serving the most important guests

GIFT BOX: Its modern packaging style is best for your friends and families as birthday or wedding gift. The intimately designed handle allows you to take crystal wine glass to anywhere safely. We also provide the perfect customer service, any problem after receiving the wine glasses, please contact us, we will solve the problem for you soon

title: Verified Purchase
content: I purchased the OJA Red Wine Glasses and I am extremely pleased with my purchase. These premium crystal wine glasses are hand blown and making them perfect for both red and white wines. I specifically bought them for date nights and they have truly enhanced the experience. The quality and durability of these glasses are outstanding. The smoothness of the glass and the elegant thin rim give them a fancy and sophisticated look. I highly recommend these wine glasses not only for daily use but also as a unique gift for special occasions like weddings, anniversaries, or birthdays. They are truly a great addition to any wine lover's collection.

title: Good Value
content: The glasses arrived well packaged and protected with custom molded foam. The seller had warned me in advance that they had received reports of some glasses arriving broken. Some customers had a cloudy appearance on the glass . The cloudy appearance was possibly due to the foam protection used. Our glasses also had a slight film which washed off with no issues, intact.  Best of all, these glasses are lead free, which may affect the ring tone when toasting glass to glass.  These glasses have more of a duller tone compared to leaded crystal glasses we own.  The stem to bowl is seamless which is easy to hold. The tulip shape bowl is attractive and easy to drink from. Cheers!
post_time: Reviewed in the United States on April 11, 2024
